parameters: town3
In the end, I... avoided the fight with Zuuteruka.

I didn't take his sweet words at face value, that he
wouldn't harm Yuia-sama and the others if I didn't oppose
him, but at that time, it seemed like the only option I had.

I have no pride or certainty that the path I chose... was
the right one.

I think it's because the path I chose wasn't something I
desired and seized for myself, but rather a result of having
'no other choice.'

It's something very heavy that I carry on my shoulders...
but it's also very precious.

A path chosen as if throwing away such things... and running
away.

What kind of face will I live with from now on? What kind of
thoughts and worries will I carry?
Right now... I don't know.
The only thing I do know...

Is that there will surely be no smile. To live with a dead
heart harbored in this sinful body.
Yet... time passes by equally for everyone.
Whether my heart dies or lives... time will pass by.
clear_all_weathers
NE_s5

\N<Luda Soldier>This is the document in question. Fill it out by tomorrow
and submit it.
\N<Riia>...

\N<Luda Soldier>Hey, you. Are you listening? I'm going out of my way to
explain this to you.

\N<Luda Soldier>Your father... no, your former father. This is the transfer
notice for his main unit. You learned how to fill it out at
the training ground, didn't you?

\N<Luda Soldier>Even if he's your former father, this document will
determine his fate. Make sure there are no mistakes.
\N<Riia>...

\N<Luda Soldier>By the way... why doesn't your mother come? Normally, it
should be the mother, not you, who appears for these
procedures.

\N<Luda Soldier>Ah... I see. With her condition, it must be difficult for
her to get around.
\N<Riia>...

\N<Luda Soldier>Speaking of which... you've already submitted your
application to join the main unit. Why at such a young age?
\N<Riia>...Do I have to tell you the reason?

\N<Luda Soldier>No, Luda only desires strong soldiers, we don't ask for
reasons. If you have the power and will to destroy and
eliminate everything, we won't ask anything more of you.

\N<Riia>Then... that's good. I'll definitely bring the documents
tomorrow.
リイア_ラメ
